original_text: John said many more things to the people. He was telling them the good news about how God could change their lives.
korean_text: 또 그밖에 여러 가지로 권하여 백성에게 좋은 소식을 전하였으나

sentences.original_text: John said many more things to the people.
sentences.korean_translation: 요한은 사람들에게 더 많은 말을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was telling them the good news
about how God could change their lives.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 어떻게 그들의 삶을 바꾸실 수 있는지에 대해.
